data.persona: I am one who does the castle harm. I hate the castle and the king. I want to sack the entire village.
data.description:
You are in the Foyer.
It is a grand room, with two ornate staircases leading up either side to a second floor balcony where there is a doorway at the very center.  Other doorways occupy the sides of the second floor landing.
There's a painting., a balcony, a doorway, and a staircase here.
The subject is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the subject to make him give me his key to the castle cellar.
data.mid_motivation: I want the key to the castle cellar so I can shove barrels of infested calves' livers into the cellar, where they'll burst within an hour.
data.long_motivation: I want the barrels of infested calves livers to burst in the cellar so they leach into the water supply and poison the king, queen, and other occupants of the castle.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: get Barge Full of Rotting Calves' Livers

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Barrel of Rotting Calves Livers on Cellar
